API Docs¶

Module of weko-sitemap.

class weko_sitemap.ext.WekoSitemap(app=None)[source]¶

Weko-sitemap extension.

Extension initialization.

clear_cache_pages()[source]¶

Clear all cached pages.

create_page(page, urlset)[source]¶

Create sitemap page and save to cache.

static get_cache_page(key)[source]¶

Get page from cache.

gzip_response(data)[source]¶

Override - Gzip response data and create new Response instance.

init_app(app)[source]¶

Flask application initialization.

init_config(app)[source]¶

Initialize configuration.

load_page(fn)[source]¶

Load sitemap page.

page(page)[source]¶

Override to get sitemap page from cache if it exists.

set_cache_page(key, value)[source]¶

Set the page into the cache.

sitemap()[source]¶

Override - Render sitemap from cache sitemap.xml.
